feed.title: Mohammad Sabokrou
feed.subtitle: Welcome to my homepage! I am an AI researcher driven by a deep curiosity about the intricate relationship between Computer Vision and Machine Learning. My passion lies in fostering trust within these domains, ensuring that the cutting-edge technologies we develop remain reliable and ethical. I hold a Ph.D. and a Master's degree in Artificial Intelligence, complemented by a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science. I am proud to hold the esteemed position of Staff Scientist within the Machine Learning and Data Science (MLDS) unit, led by Prof. Makoto Yamada, at the Okinawa Institute of Science and Technology (OIST) in picturesque Okinawa, Japan. Here, I continue to delve into the ever-evolving landscape of AI, contributing to groundbreaking research and innovation. My journey has been rich and diverse. Prior to my role at OIST, I served as a faculty member at the School of Computer Science, Institute for Research in Fundamental Sciences (IPM), situated in vibrant Tehran, Iran. During this career chapter, I had the privilege of leading the AI group, playing a pivotal role in its growth and advancement. I've also been a Senior Researcher at the renowned Center for Machine Vision and Signal Analysis (CMVS), housed within the University of Oulu in Finland and Troyes University in France.

entry.title: Future Blog Post
entry.content: This post will show up by default. To disable scheduling of future posts, edit config.yml and set future: false.
